channel.title: GuardianScape 317 (Allstar Based) (Dicing) (Gambling) (Only server of its kind!)
channel.description:
Server Ip: GuardianScape.no-ip.org
[size=18pt] You NEED client to Login to the server![/size] Download Client at http://uppit.com/w27geulhr4ce/GuardianScape_Client.rar
If you download the first client and it will not work, please try this one: http://uppit.com/53p7nh8q3spl/GuardianScape_Client_2.rar
If you log in and get kicked immediately, you need the client. [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/e9wyn9.png[/img]
Visit our site (Still under construction): http://guardianscape.enjin.com/
Updates!
New Source and Client! We are now using Paradise 317 as the creator Dokan42 is a player on the server and allowed me to use them and helps me with anything I need. The server is now null proof and syi proof! Thank you Dokan! You now must type ::starter before you can ::yell
Max stat level is 200
Exp rate is much lower for combat!
Thieving stalls give less money
Max combat is 255
GuardianScape GuardianScape is an Allstar based 317 made by Guardianman5. The server is still in Beta as it makes it's way away from any normal Allstar based server. As of now the server is an exact copy of Allstar except for a new home and some changes made in the shops. Guardianscape is working on keeping the same old 317 Allstar expierience but making a better economy and the leveling more time consuming. GuardianScape looks to keep you coming back to the server to advance your skills a month down the road instead of maxing your levels and cash in a matter of 2 hours.
What we have to offer As of now GuardianScape is nothing but your average server. But with time and a great community this server can go a long way!
As of now we are loaded with things like: -Gs Mini -Barrows -Slayer -Enchanted Minigame -Icon Minigame and many different forms of Pking!
Is there any thing I can do to help? Guardianscape is under a lot of construction at the moment and can always use a helping hand. Helping out is a great way to get a jump on a staff position. Types of people we are looking for include: Extra hands for Coding Someone who can make a Webclient Graphics designers Someone who is on frequently to keep server under control
Media
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2eztdg0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2d7u8h1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/1zx3yv8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2qvfs48.png[/img]

item.title: GuardianScape 317 (Allstar Based) (Dicing) (Gambling) (Only server of its kind!)
item.dc:creator: @Guardianman5 Guardianman5
item.description:
@Guardianman5 wrote:

Allstars are my all time favorites and always will be, but nobody seems to like them as much anymore. there are a select few who stay active but allstars are known for getting boring aftyer 4 days and there are only so many people out there who like to play them, and I think most of them have already gotten bored with my server haha so I guess I’ll just move on to a 317 pk server and see how that goes. Glad to see I have inspired others to start some allstar servers though

Read full topic

item.title: GuardianScape 317 (Allstar Based) (Dicing) (Gambling) (Only server of its kind!)
item.dc:creator: @Guardianman5 Guardianman5
item.description:
@Guardianman5 wrote:

Understandable man, I have been far to busy to even log on. I gave ownership to one of my players and made myself just a normal player and told him the server is all his and I’ll host it for one week, the week ends on 8/27 and I told him if he can get it active again then he can remain owner and I will continue to host. If not I am moving onto a pk server and figure I will give that a try.

Read full topic
